name: Asteroids (itch) (VeryCrafty)
description:
ASTEROIDS
Best played with Xbox controllers and 3x friends.

Designed to be a challenging couch-space-themed-death-match arena, but you can play single player and co-op as well.

Keyboard
If you're playing with the keyboard:

Movement = ARROWS
Shoot = SPACE
Menu = ESC
Special abilities 1, 2, 3 = Q, W, E

STILL IN DEVELOPMENT
I'm using this project to learn how to do different things in Unity (or how I'd do it differently next time). It's been a blast (pun intended) trying to figure all the ins and outs of making a game. Still lots to do as you can tell...
